verses.verse: "Now you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>get<s%> yourself a <S%H3843>brick,<s%> <S%H5414>place<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H2710>inscribe<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> on it, <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"Then <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>siege<s%> <S%H1785>wall,<s%> <S%H8210>raise<s%> up a <S%H5550>ramp,<s%> <S%H5414>pitch<s%> <S%H4264>camps,<s%> and <S%H7760>place<s%> <S%H3733>battering<s%> <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

"Then <S%H3947>get<s%> yourself an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>plate<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it up as an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> it so that it is under <S%H4692>siege,<s%> and <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it. <S%H1931>This<s%> is a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"As for you, <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> on your <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on it; you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> for the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H7901>lie<s%> on it.

"For I have <S%H5414>assigned<s%> you a <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> corresponding to the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> thus you shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"When you have <S%H3615>completed<s%> <S%H428>these,<s%> you shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time,<s%> [but] on your <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> I have <S%H5414>assigned<s%> it to you for <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> for each <S%H8141>year.<s%>

"Then you shall <S%H3559>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with your <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H2834>bared,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> on you so that you <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H2015>turn<s%> from one <S%H6654>side<s%> to the <S%H6654>other,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H3615>completed<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H4692>siege.<s%>

"But as for you, <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> <S%H8184>barley,<s%> <S%H6321>beans,<s%> <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> <S%H1764>millet<s%> and <S%H3698>spelt,<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> them into <S%H3899>bread<s%> for yourself; you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that you <S%H7901>lie<s%> on your <S%H6654>side,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

"And your <S%H3978>food<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> [shall be] <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> by <S%H4946>weight;<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time.<s%>

"And the <S%H4325>water<s%> you <S%H8354>drink<s%> will be the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8345>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> by <S%H4884>measure;<s%> you shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> it from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time.<s%>
"And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it as a <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cake,<s%> having <S%H5746>baked<s%> [it] in their <S%H5869>sight<s%> over <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H1561>dung.<s%> <S%H6627><s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3602>"Thus<s%> shall the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I shall <S%H5080>banish<s%> them."

But I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Ah, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God!<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2930>been<s%> <S%H2930>defiled;<s%> for from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H5038>what<s%> <S%H5038>died<s%> of itself or was <S%H2966>torn<s%> by <S%H2966>beasts,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> has any <S%H6292>unclean<s%> <S%H1320>meat<s%> ever <S%H935>entered<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>"

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7200>"See,<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you cow's <S%H6832>dung<s%> in <S%H8478>place<s%> of <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H1561>dung<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> which you will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> your <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"

Moreover, He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and they will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> and with <S%H1674>anxiety,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure<s%> and in <S%H8078>horror,<s%>

<S%H4616>because<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%> will be <S%H2637>scarce;<s%> and they will be <S%H8074>appalled<s%> with <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another<s%> and <S%H4743>waste<s%> <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
